title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page (and it is flagged by a red indicator on the UI), if I try to select another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog is displayed with the message: 'Warning: The currently displayed page contains invalid values'. This dialog should be changed to an error dialog since users should not be allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
